hero.title: Hello, I am Guillaume Naimi
hero.subtitle: My name is Guillaume NAIMI, a front-end developer specializing in React, TypeScript, and Next.js. I enjoy creating powerful, clean, and user-centric interfaces. I'm curious, rigorous, and always looking for best practices and challenging projects.
